page.title: 11DAIRYS IN SIBLE HEDINGHAM.
page.content: On 30th April we went to visit {Tanner's Dairy.}They sell milk and other produce as well. It took 44 years to build up their business. They do not have their own cows.The milk is collected by their fleet of tankers from farms all over North Essex and Suffolk. The milk goes through six machines before it is ready to drink. Then it is delivered to other{dairy's}and people's doorsteps. On 23rd April we visited{Fuller's} {Dairy,}where they farm 60 acres. In one field we saw about 70 Jersey cows, some calves and chickens.They do not produce or sell milk but make a wide selection of{Dairy Produce}such as Yoghurt,Cheese Cake and Soft Cheese. Both{Dairy's} are family owned and run businesses.
